languages.text: "Ваша Светлость, не могу не отметить ваши бесстрашие и проницательность... и прошу прощения за слабость духа. Мой позорный страх помешал мне исполнить свой долг. Впредь подобное не повторится".

traits.locale_text: {n}Даже в тусклом свете люменов видно, как багровеет от стыда его лицо.{/n} "Ваша Светлость, благодарю за милосердие... и прошу прощения за слабость духа. Мой позорный страх подверг вас опасности и помешал мне исполнить свой долг. Клянусь, впредь я не буду позволять своей тщедушности брать верх над разумом".

languages.text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I must commend your fearlessness and insight... and apologise for my weakness of spirit. My shameful fear prevented me from doing my duty. It will not happen again."
languages.original_text: "Ваша Светлость, не могу не отметить ваши бесстрашие и проницательность... и прошу прощения за слабость духа. Мой позорный страх помешал мне исполнить свой долг. Впредь подобное не повторится".

traits.locale_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I must commend your fearlessness and insight... and apologise for my weakness of spirit. My shameful fear prevented me from doing my duty. It will not happen again."
"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I must commend your fearlessness and insight... and apologise for my weakness of spirit. My shameful fear prevented me from doing my duty. It will not happen again."
"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I must commend your fearlessness and insight... and apologise for my weakness of spirit. My shameful fear prevented me from doing my duty. It will not happen again."
"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I must commend your fearlessness and insight... and apologise for my weakness of spirit. My shameful fear prevented me from doing my duty. It will not happen again."
"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I must commend your fearlessness and insight... and apologise for my weakness of spirit. My shameful fear prevented me from doing my duty. It will not happen again."
"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I must commend your fearlessness and insight... and apologise for my weakness of spirit. My shameful fear prevented me from doing my duty. It will not happen again."

languages.text: «Mi {mf|lord|lady}, su valentía y perspicacia son dignas de elogio... me disculpo por mi falta de espíritu. No cumplí con mis obligaciones, pues me abrumó el miedo. No volverá a suceder».
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I must commend your fearlessness and insight... and apologise for my weakness of spirit. My shameful fear prevented me from doing my duty. It will not happen again."

traits.locale_text: «Mi {mf|lord|lady}, su valentía y perspicacia son dignas de elogio... me disculpo por mi falta de espíritu. No cumplí con mis obligaciones, pues me abrumó el miedo. No volverá a suceder».

languages.text: 「陛下、あなたの大胆不敵さと洞察力を称えなければなりません…そして私の精神の弱さをお詫びします。私の恥ずべき恐怖心が、義務を果たすことを妨げました。二度とこのようなことはいたしません」
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I must commend your fearlessness and insight... and apologise for my weakness of spirit. My shameful fear prevented me from doing my duty. It will not happen again."

traits.locale_text: 「陛下、あなたの大胆不敵さと洞察力を称えなければなりません…そして私の精神の弱さをお詫びします。私の恥ずべき恐怖心が、義務を果たすことを妨げました。二度とこのようなことはいたしません」

languages.text: “大人，我必须赞美您的勇气与洞见……我为我的软弱道歉。出于可耻的恐惧，我不敢尽我本应尽到的责任，不过这种事情再也不会发生了。”
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I must commend your fearlessness and insight... and apologise for my weakness of spirit. My shameful fear prevented me from doing my duty. It will not happen again."

traits.locale_text: “大人，我必须赞美您的勇气与洞见……我为我的软弱道歉。出于可耻的恐惧，我不敢尽我本应尽到的责任，不过这种事情再也不会发生了。”

languages.text: "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, ich muss Eure Furchtlosigkeit und Einsicht anerkennen ... und entschuldige mich für meine Geistesschwäche. Meine peinliche Angst hat mich von der Erfüllung meiner Pflicht abgehalten. Das wird nicht noch einmal geschehen."
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I must commend your fearlessness and insight... and apologise for my weakness of spirit. My shameful fear prevented me from doing my duty. It will not happen again."

traits.locale_text: "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, ich muss Eure Furchtlosigkeit und Einsicht anerkennen ... und entschuldige mich für meine Geistesschwäche. Meine peinliche Angst hat mich von der Erfüllung meiner Pflicht abgehalten. Das wird nicht noch einmal geschehen."

languages.text: « Votre Seigneurie, votre intrépidité et votre perspicacité sont dignes de louanges… Veuillez pardonner ma faiblesse d'esprit. J'ai laissé ma peur prendre le dessus et m'empêcher d'accomplir mon devoir. Cela ne se reproduira pas. »
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I must commend your fearlessness and insight... and apologise for my weakness of spirit. My shameful fear prevented me from doing my duty. It will not happen again."

traits.locale_text: « Votre Seigneurie, votre intrépidité et votre perspicacité sont dignes de louanges… Veuillez pardonner ma faiblesse d'esprit. J'ai laissé ma peur prendre le dessus et m'empêcher d'accomplir mon devoir. Cela ne se reproduira pas. »

languages.text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, korkusuzluğunuz ve içgörünüzü takdir etmeliyim. Cesaretsizliğim için de affınıza sığınıyorum. Utanç verici derecede korkuya kapılmam, vazifemi yerine getirmeme engel oldu. Böyle bir vaziyet bir daha yaşanmayacak."
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I must commend your fearlessness and insight... and apologise for my weakness of spirit. My shameful fear prevented me from doing my duty. It will not happen again."
